item.title: Comment on Rolling Jubilee – Second Debt Buy by M21: Protest For-Profit Insurance | Healthcare-NOW! New York City
item.dc:creator: M21: Protest For-Profit Insurance | Healthcare-NOW! New York City
item.description: [...] Today, when you buy health insurance, you’re making a bet that doesn’t pay off. And it’s not just a bet with money, it’s a bet with your life. In response to this broken system, Strike Debt’s Rolling Jubilee initiative has taken action: we have purchased and abolished $1 Million of medical debt. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Today, when you buy health insurance, you’re making a bet that doesn’t pay off. And it’s not just a bet with money, it’s a bet with your life. In response to this broken system, Strike Debt’s Rolling Jubilee initiative has taken action: we have purchased and abolished $1 Million of medical debt. […]
